summary: Completed frontend testing for color overlay/tint system and wellness page enhancements. All 10 requested features verified working correctly.
passed_tests: Product detail page: Same base image stays when changing shell color - PASS
Product detail page: Same base image stays when changing cabinet color - PASS
Product detail page: Color indicator badges appear on image showing selected colors (dynamic updates work) - PASS
Product detail page: Color selector shows color name labels under swatches (White, Silver, Opal, Coastal, Walnut, Barnwood, Black) - PASS
Product detail page: Color summary section at bottom of color selector displays Shell and Cabinet selections - PASS
Wellness page: Hero section with 'Live Your Best Life' text displays correctly - PASS
Wellness page: Image gallery section with 3 images visible and functional with hover effects - PASS
Wellness page: Each benefit section (5 total) has an accompanying image - PASS
Wellness page: Benefit sections have bullet point lists with leaf icons (15 icons found) - PASS
Wellness page: Testimonials section with 2 cards, 5-star ratings, customer quotes - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: Color tint overlay system properly implemented using CSS gradients with mixBlendMode: multiply
ColorTintOverlay component correctly applies shell color to upper portion and cabinet color to lower/side portions
Color badges use Framer Motion for smooth animations when colors change
Base image (product.images.primary/overhead) stays consistent - no image swapping on color selection
ColorSelector component properly displays color name labels using SHELL_COLORS and CABINET_COLORS mapping
Wellness page well-structured with hero, gallery, benefits, stats, testimonials, and CTA sections
GALLERY_IMAGES array contains 3 images with captions for the gallery section
BENEFIT_IMAGES object maps benefit IDs to relevant wellness imagery
getBenefitPoints helper function returns 3 bullet points per benefit section
seed_data_creation: N/A - Frontend only with static data in products.js and constants.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: Color overlay/tint system working correctly - base images stay same when changing colors, CSS overlays apply color tints. Color badges appear on image and update dynamically. Wellness page has full content with hero, 3-image gallery, 5 benefit sections with images and bullet lists, stats section, 2 testimonials with star ratings, and CTA section.
